name: Salad Dressing - Lemon Hint Vinaigrette
description: This Lemon Hint Vinaigrette is a perfect embodiment of a Healthyfied recipe, making it ideal for anyone following a low-carb and low-sugar diet. The tangy lemon juice paired with the subtle heat of white pepper creates a refreshing dressing that elevates any salad.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, add 0.25 cup of lemon juice and 0.25 cup of vinegar.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Add 0.06 tsp of rock salt and 0.06 tsp(s) of white pepper to the mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 packet of sugar substitute to the bowl and whisk all the ingredients together until the sugar substitute is fully dissolved and the dressing is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Taste the dressing and adjust the seasoning if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Store the vinaigrette in a sealed container in the refrigerator until ready to use.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
